code: import{addOns,teaList,teaSizes}from"../pages/milktea/list";var getItemName=function getItemName(item){var name="";teaList.filter(function(val){if(val.id===(item===null||item===void 0?void 0:item.tea)){name=val.name;}});return name;};var getSizeName=function getSizeName(item){var name="";teaSizes.filter(function(val){if(val.id===(item===null||item===void 0?void 0:item.size)){name=val.name;}});return name;};var getAddOn=function getAddOn(item){var name="";addOns.filter(function(val){if(val.id===(item===null||item===void 0?void 0:item.addOn)){name=val.name;}});return name;};export var formatTea=function formatTea(item){return"".concat(getItemName(item)," - (").concat(getSizeName(item),") - ").concat(getAddOn(item));};export var formatTeaPrice=function formatTeaPrice(val){var price=0;teaSizes.filter(function(item){if(item.id===val.size){price=item.price;}});return price;};export var formatTotalPrice=function formatTotalPrice(val){var priceList=[];val.filter(function(e){priceList.push(formatTeaPrice(e));});var sum=priceList.reduce(function(partialSum,a){return partialSum+a;},0);return formatPrice(sum);};export var formatPrice=function formatPrice(i){return"\u20B1 ".concat(numberWithCommas(i),".00");};var numberWithCommas=function numberWithCommas(x){return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g,",");};
